Package entity.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.board.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board representation of the game. it consists of 4 subboards that can be rotated either clockwise or counterclockwise. A board can only be shared by 2 players at a time and has 36 cells where users or computer players can place marbles.

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(boolean top,
                   boolean left,
                   boolean clockwise)
        Rotate one of the 4 subboards either clockwise or counterclockwise.
        Parameters:
        top - if the subboard is on top.
        left - if the subboard is on left.
        clockwise - if the subboard should be rotated clockwise.

        Parameters:
        initRow - initial row
        initCol - initial column
        radius - rotation radius
